info.brief_description: A collection of stories about girls with something extra down below.
info.description:
A collection of stories about girls with dicks. Maybe they were born with them maybe they were cursed. The details are up to you!

A few quick rules:
1. Please use good spelling and grammar in this story.
2. Always leave an option for other story ideas when adding a story selection chapter.
3. Please be consistent within a story branch. You can write in whatever tense and perspective you want when starting a story, but please stay consistent from there. If a story is in third person and past tense don't suddenly switch to second person present tense.
4. Sex of any kind is allowed.
6. Most importantly, have fun.
